item.description:
Kirstein Business Film Series at Rabb Lecture Hall, Boston Public Library on Wednesdays in January, 6 - 7:45 pm.

January 9 The Devil Wears Prada (2006)
A young woman is hired by a demanding fashion editor who provokes her in thinking what she really wants out of life.

January 16 The Social Network (2010)
The true story of Mark Zuckerbergâ€™s creation of the social networking site known as Facebook and the battles over its ownership.

January 23 Thank You for Smoking (2005)
A Big Tobacco spokesman who puts a positive spin on cigarettes tries to remain a role model for his 12 year old son.

January 30 Wall Street (2000)
An ambitious young man is lured into the illegal world of insider trading and corporate greed.

More details -
http://www.bpl.org/kbl/about/upcoming-programs/
item.name: Movies at Boston Public Library
